title: Daily internet usage per capita worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by device
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Desktop, and Mobile. The y axis indicates the Time in minutes and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Mobile, and lastly, 2. Desktop.
Overall across the Year, Mobile mostly maintained the highest Time in minutes when compared to others with a mean value of 92.0, and it peaked at 2021.
Desktop mostly had the least Time in minutes with a mean value of 42.09, which peaked at 2013 with a value of 49.0.
The minimum Time in minutes about 32.0, occured at 2011 by Mobile.
The greatest difference of Time in minutes between Desktop and Mobile occurs at Year 2021 and the smallest difference occurs at 2013.
